# lcod://tooling/json/stable_stringify@0.1.0

Serialize a value to JSON using a deterministic key order.

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `value` | any | No | Value to serialize. |

## Outputs

| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `text` | string | JSON string when serialization succeeds; otherwise null. |
| `warning` | string | Error message when serialization fails. |
